channel.title: Omg moparscape wont stay open someone help please :-(!
channel.description:
omg every time i open moparscape it works fine on the .jar and the .bat but when it gets to the client it automatically closes and idk why. Here is a good picture that took timing to take and its the screne right when it closes, the bottom thing says downloading something and i think thats why but idk how to fix this or whatever...
[img]http://imagegecko.com/images/owbf8q3o20j05ltwx20.jpg[/img]
any help please?

item.title: Omg moparscape wont stay open someone help please :-(!
item.dc:creator: @eagleheight eagleheight
item.description:
@eagleheight wrote:

OMG i have the same problem, when i use the web client, this comes up.

java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.jar.JarFile.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.jar.JarFile.(Unknown Source)
at org.moparscape.c.a(Unknown Source)
at org.moparscape.c.b(Unknown Source)
at org.moparscape.c.(Unknown Source)
at org.moparscape.c.(Unknown Source)
at org.moparscape.k.a(Unknown Source)
at org.moparscape.Applet.init(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Could not load client, exiting…

Read full topic
item.source: Omg moparscape wont stay open someone help please :-(!
